casebody.data:
Matthew EIRICK v. SOUTHERN ELECTRIC SUPPLY COMPANY, INC. of Delaware, Reulet Electric Supplies, and Square D Company. No. 98-C-2197. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Nov. 13, 1998.

Prior report: La.App., — So.2d -.

*261In re Eirick, Matthew; — Plaintiff(s); applying for writ of certiorari and/or review; Parish of East Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court, Div. “H”, No. 413,419; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. CA97 0435.

Denied.

LEMMON, J., not on panel.
